hairstyle.Long Straight Cascading: long silky straight hair cascading down the back
hairstyle.Shoulder Waves: shoulder length loose waves with center part
hairstyle.High Ponytail: high voluminous ponytail with silk bow
hairstyle.Messy Buns: two messy buns high on head
hairstyle.Waist Curls: waist length curly hair flowing over shoulders
hairstyle.Single Braid: thick single braid over one shoulder

outfit.Oversized Hoodie: wearing an oversized grey hoodie over black biker shorts
outfit.Cropped Tank: wearing a white cropped tank top with baggy ripped jeans
outfit.Ribbed Turtleneck: wearing a tight ribbed turtleneck tucked into high-waisted plaid skirt
outfit.Silk Slip Dress: wearing a red silk slip dress with spaghetti straps
outfit.Bodycon Midi: wearing a white bodycon midi dress made of ribbed fabric
outfit.Leather Jacket: wearing a black leather motorcycle jacket over band t-shirt

pose.Weight On Hip: standing with weight shifted to one hip, arms above head
pose.Legs Crossed Ankles: lying on back with legs raised and crossed at ankles
pose.Knees To Chest: sitting with knees pulled to chest, arms wrapped around shins
pose.Kneeling Upright: kneeling upright with back arched, head tilted up
pose.Over Shoulder: turning back to camera, looking over shoulder

atmosphere.Soft Golden Glow: soft diffused golden light creating warm hazy glow
atmosphere.Deep Blue Fog: deep blue ambient light with swirling thick white fog
atmosphere.Neon Pink Teal: saturated neon pink lighting with deep teal shadows
atmosphere.Warm Flickering: warm flickering orange light with dancing shadows
atmosphere.Cool Pale Blue: cool pale blue light with misty humid texture

technical.Shallow DOF: shallow depth of field, soft bokeh
technical.FLUX: raw photo, natural colors, detailed texture
